description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fly a space fighter in this 3D space shooter then switch to a 2D map of space and construct defensive turrets.    Buy missiles, machine guns, and lasers to enhance your ship, deploy a variety of defensive assets, and blast your way through 15 levels of intense action.  Torino-X combines all aspects of a space fighting simulator and a strategy based turret defense game into one unique platform.
